title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\PatchJobInstanceDetails
name: PatchJobInstanceDetails
description:
Patch details for a VM instance. For more information about reviewing VM instance details, see Listing all VM instance details for a specific patch job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.PatchJobInstanceDetails

params.description: If the patch fails, this field provides the reason.

params.name: data.attempt_count
params.description: The number of times the agent that the agent attempts to apply the patch.
